Name: Selfmade Devil
About the game: Selfmade Devil is a casual semi-placed game with a rich variety of magic objects, enemies, and maps.Players as the demon king in the mysterious girl under the guidance of the cultivation of magic ability, transformation of the demon King city, improve the efficiency of material acquisition, to create a powerful demon king army to invade human territory! The game features Super easy to use game flow, simple 2 in 1 upgrade system Up to 40+ magic forms and 30+ enemies Slingshot combat mode similar to marbles Magic city construction will greatly improve efficiency, after level 30 will unlock the automatic synthesis function, free hands, free to hang up
